title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a big belly in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a big belly in a dream: A belly in a person’s dream reflects decent living and abundance obtained from a lawful source. In other places, he explains that he sees the underbelly of hunger, poverty, and project failure. A pioneer can lose his job and be hated in dreams by a married woman with a live pregnancy and a relative, which can indicate the stability of the family by God’s command. In other interpretations, we see that the stomach and flatulence in a pregnant woman’s dream reflect the psychological state, mood, and psychological pressure resulting from pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a belly A large lump in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a single girl with a lump in a dream is many, and if she is a knowledge seeker, the vision indicates success and achieving the highest grades. The presence of a lump in a dream for a single woman indicates good news on the way to her and perhaps in some places an engagement from a well-off person. If an unmarried woman opens her stomach in a dream, this indicates the approaching marriage to a person of good nature and religion, who is the source of her happiness. Many things come out of a girl’s stomach, and they are an exposed scandal, God forbid. Perhaps her vision warns her against revealing other people's secrets and having an abdominal wound. Unstable mental state. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a stomach in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is trying to open her stomach, this indicates pregnancy in the near future. If a married woman sees her stomach open and does not know the reason behind it, this indicates that she is busy with some Things that she thinks about a lot. The open stomach in the dreams of a married woman, which is completely empty, indicates the disappearance of fears and the disappearance of sorrows. If she sees that her stomach is opening, this is a sign of her desire to earn a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a stomach in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream That she is trying to open her belly, because this indicates the health of the child. The open belly in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of removing fears, eliminating anxiety, and removing anxiety. The pregnant woman’s belly in a dream can indicate that the date of birth is approaching. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a belly in a dream for a manSeeing a man His stomach is torn in a dream and with many bones, it means that it is better to approach him. The dream’s open stomach is evidence of his intelligence and good behavior. Seeing a man blowing on someone’s stomach indicates that he wants to reveal one of the things hidden from him. Seeing a man’s stomach to his wife open in A dream, because this indicates the goodness of pregnancy and its closeness. Seeing a man in a dream is a woman who wants to open his stomach, so this is a vision of praise and indicates happy days that are coming his way. Various indicators of seeing the belly in a dream. The belly in a dream is food and goodness, and great benefits for walking soon, and the belly A large one in a married woman’s dream is an imminent pregnancy, and in a pregnant woman’s dream it is placed by God’s command. Folding the stomach in a dream is a loss of money and work and can indicate hunger and poverty. Sudden loss of the stomach in a dream is major disasters and problems, God forbid. The abdominal entrails in a dream indicate To abundance of money and blessings in food and drink, perhaps in a dream

title: Interpretation of a knife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a knife in a dream: Seeing a knife in a dreamIt is a matter of concern and confusion for many people and they wonder about the meaning and importance of this strange dream. In this context, we will get to know you in this article about the interpretation of a knife in a dream, so follow us. Interpretation of a knife in a dream The interpretation of seeing a knife in a dream varies depending on The psychological and social state of the dreamer. The interpretation varies from one person to another depending on how the knife is used and the condition of the knife and the dreamer in the dream. The leading scholars and dream interpreters differed in their interpretation of seeing the knife in a dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the knife in a dream as meaning that the dreamer will have a righteous son - if God willing - if he does not use the knife in the dream. But if he uses the knife in the dream, this is interpreted as meaning that the dreamer will stop and distance himself from something that is occupying himself at the moment, whether it is practical or personal. On the other hand, Al-Nabulsi interpreted the vision of the knife In a dream, it is a sign of a useful servant to the dreamer. Using a knife in a dream indicates that the dreamer will triumph over his opponents and enemies - God willing - the Almighty. Swallowing a knife in a dream indicates that the dreamer is eating unfairly from his son’s money. Cutting meat with a knife in The dream suggests that the dreamer is involved in sins and gossip. While cutting vegetables in a dream indicates that the dreamer has energy, effort, and diligence in his work and personal life. Sharpening a knife in a dream is interpreted as preparation for an important and pivotal event in one’s life. While a sharp knife in The dream indicates that the dreamer is tied by hand or without a will and is forced to rely on others to manage his life’s affairs. Seeing a rusty knife in a dream indicates the presence of distorted and unstable social relations in the dreamer’s life. It may also indicate that the dreamer is separated and his family ties are cut off. The dreamer indicates that Seeing someone chasing him with a knife in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face a big problem in the coming period of his life. Seeing the dreamer killing himself in a dream with a knife is clear evidence to the dreamer that he is exposed to suspicions and accusations and that he is making a mistake in disobedience and sin. Threatening with a knife in a dream is a warning message to the dreamer that He must pay attention to the plots planned against him. Interpretation of a knife in an unmarried girl’s dream. Scientists interpret seeing a knife in an unmarried girl’s dream as a sign of engagement or marriage for the dreamer in the near future - God willing. It could also be a sign of the dreamer’s victory over her enemies. Or fears that she is constantly controlling. Carrying a knife in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates that there are many unresolved issues in the dreamer’s life, which he must solve as quickly as possible, in order to escape from their dire consequences. Interpretation of the knife in the dream of a married woman, interpreted by scholars A married woman seeing a knife in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of problems in her life, and it also indicates the death of worries and sorrows and relief from distress - God willing. Buying a new knife from a married woman in

title: Interpretation of itching in a dream Meaning of itching in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of itching in a dream on the hair of the head, back, body, right and left hand, face, allergic diseases, and skin irritation such as scabies, boils, or pus and pimples for pregnant women, for divorced women, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a dream about itching, according to Ibn Sirin. In a dream, this indicates poverty and the need to search for children. Whoever dreams that he is rubbing his body, he will control the conditions of his relatives and become bored with them. If the itching subsides, it improves with fatigue. And whoever sees an itch on the street or in a group of people, it will affect him with the money that he is famous for. Itchy If you see people who make you feel itchy and you try to avoid touching them, you will fear sad consequences when your efforts lead to success. If you dream that you are scratching, this means that you are in a bad profession. Happy Interpretation of itching in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing itching and itching was mentioned in the book Interpretation of Dreams in Chapter 25 with the interpretation of seeing pain, diseases and injuries, where Muhammad ibn Sirin said that itching in a dream is evidence that the fortuneteller is. Asking about the condition of his relatives and friends, or whether they miss the sight, or is it an indication of future worries and problems. From relatives and friends, if seeing itching and itching in a dream has nothing to do with reality. The dreamer is suffering from a skin disease. Interpretation of seeing itching in a dream. Either the Western school or the modern school said that seeing itching and scratching in a dream due to a disease such as scabies is a good vision because it indicates the dreamer’s good condition, or that itching and scratching may indicate jealousy. Or doubt if a woman sees in her dream that another woman is scratching and scratching. Interpretation of scratching and scratching the back in a dream: Seeing the back in a dream is an indication of a bond or is the person associated with the leader whom the dreamer can rely on in adversity and adversity, and seeing the back being rubbed in a dream reflects fears or The dreamer is worried about a friend or relative, and strong and continuous itching and scratching of the back indicates that the dreamer is exposed to the absence of a relative or friend, or blame and blame between them. Seeing severe itching and scratching of the back, accompanied by blood flow from repeated scratching, is good news for the end of worries and suffering. And scratching the back of the governor or president, indicating that he will help him in the future. Interpretation of an itchy hand in a dream: As for seeing the hand itchy and scratched in a dream, scratching the right hand means obtaining money, and scratching the left hand indicates running out of money, paying it, or losing it. Safety and security in food, clothing, and shelter, and the blessings of life, life, and money. Interpretation of scratching the head in a dream. If you dream that you are rubbing your head with your nails, this means that strangers will harass you with their hypocrisy and falsehood. You realize their false loyalty and their attempt to take advantage of you. Interpretation of rubbing the head and hair in a dream: Seeing hair in a dream is a sign of worries and problems, and seeing itching and scratching in the head or hair is a sign of the removal of worries and problems, God willing. It is a matter of dissolving one’s rulings or paying one’s debts, and the best vision in one’s hair is removing lice from one’s hair, because it brings good news, wealth, and good condition, God willing. Interpretation of itching in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Itching from

title: What is the interpretation of a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: Seeing a dog in a dream. Leading scholars mentioned that a dog in a dream expresses either an old enemy that is hiding in the dreamer, or mistakes that affect him and even cast a shadow on his future. Now we will meet the interpretation of a dog in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream? Dreams often reveal what is going on in the mind and heart of the beholder, and when he sees a dog in his dream, he feels very afraid and may lose some confidence in himself as a result of his exposure to painful situations in life that he may be able to overcome. not. To deal with it properly, here are some interpretations that express the dream depending on its details: The vision may express the dreamer’s feelings towards his friend, whom he considers a brother, and shares all his personal secrets with him, and is later surprised that he is a creep who only seeks his own interests, while pretending to be friendly and loyal to him. . Having a group of dogs fighting in front of you in a dream means that you are confused between many things and thoughts interfering in your mind until you feel confused and unable to make decisions. In the event that there is a pet dog sitting next to you, and its appearance does not indicate anything bad, this is a sign of a state of anxiety. The psychological calm that you are experiencing after a difficult stage that you went through in the past. A dog that barks in a person’s dream means a bad friend who is trying to lead him on the path of deception, as they hate him for being a loyal person and want to do him the same bad ways. A woman who hears this barking is a sign of imminent turmoil in Her married life, due to the interference of acquaintances or friends, and she should not open the door to let them in and try to contain the problem before it gets worse. A hunting dog that helps the fortuneteller in guarding and hunting is a sign that he has received help from someone he did not expect, which will make him change his view of this person for the better. Seeing a dark dog is evidence that there is someone waiting for you and wishing you harm in your business or trade, if you are a merchant or a self-employed person. The Egyptian website is the largest dream interpretation website in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation website in Google and get The correct interpretations. The dog in Ibn Sirin’s dream. The dog in Ibn Sirin’s dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that a dog expresses many things. It is a loyal animal to its owner when it is a pet and lives with him in the same place, and it can express hatred and malice if it appears rabid. Or he barks in his owner’s dream, and from here we can see different interpretations that we offer by counting the points: If the dreamer wishes in his dream to give birth to a dog, then he often does not find faith and sincerity in those around him, as if he lives alone in this life without being friendly or kind. This feeling may stem from his inability to attract friends. . He has flaws in his nature and morals, and there is no objection to him improving some of the qualities that he possesses until he finds someone who will be his friend. Seeing him trying to bite him in a dream is a sign that he is being exposed to serious injustice at work or from his family, and if he tries to escape from it, then in reality he is fleeing from this injustice. If If he sees a prostitute, he exposes himself to a corrupt woman who tries to manipulate his feelings and blackmail M

title: The interpretation of eating bread in a dream for a married woman includes the correct interpretations

preview.html: We present an interpretation of eating bread in a dream for a married woman. It is one of the most important ingredients that people eat around the world and is used in preparing many different foods and popular meals in many countries, but what about seeing it in a dream? Is it a vision of good or evil? If the wife is worried about such a vision or should be happy, the answers to these questions are what we will learn through the next article on the encyclopedia website, so follow us. Interpretation of eating bread in a dream for a married woman. There are many interpretations of seeing a married woman eating bread in a dream, as he said. Dream interpretation scholars. One of the most promising visions for a married woman is to see in her dream that she is eating white bread, as this dream shows the feelings of stability that she feels in her married life, and it also shows the end of problems and arguments between her and her husband. And that life between them will return to normal. If a married woman sees that she is making bread and feeding it to a small child, then this vision is good news for her from God Almighty that she will soon give birth and give birth to a good child that will please her eyes. Eating bread in a married woman’s dream is considered a good dream, as it indicates that this The woman will soon hear good news and will feel happy and grateful for this news. One of the most promising visions for a married woman is to see that she is feeding the dead person bread, and this dream indicates that this woman will possess many good things, God willing, and that her circumstances will change for the better. The meaning of eating bread in a dreamWho dreams that he Eating bread made from white flour, this vision is considered a promising vision indicating that the dreamer will receive good and abundant food, God willing. If the bread he eats tastes like sugar, then this dream is considered a bad dream, as it indicates that the dreamer will face many financial difficulties in the future. Managing his daily life, due to the high prices in the country. Also among the dreams that do not bring goodness is that a person sees in his dream that he is eating bread made from dark flour, and this dream means that the dreamer will face many difficulties and problems and must ask God Almighty for help. . To get out of them. Interpretation of buying bread in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is buying bread in her dream, the interpretation of this dream varies depending on the details contained in it. If a woman sees that she is buying bread and eating it without paying for it, then it is considered a promising vision that indicates that Her circumstances will change for the better, and she will have good news in the future that will make her feel happy. On the contrary, if he pays for the bread he bought, this is a sign that he will get into trouble. Eating bread in a married woman’s dream. If a woman sees that she is making beautiful bread and distributing it to neighbors and relatives who eat it and feel happy about eating it, then this dream is one of the dreams that carries connotations. Thebes, as it indicates that this woman will be blessed by God. A broad diet that would improve her circumstances. And if her vision was that she gave her husband bread to eat, and it was delicious and tasty,

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of walking on beach sand?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about walking on the sand on the beach: Many psychologists agreed that there are some dreams after which a person feels a state of happiness and psychological comfort, and among these dreams is seeing the sea in a dream and walking on the sand of its beaches, so many translators, led by Ahmed bin. Cyrine interpreted the dream of walking on the beach sand for a single woman, a married woman, or a pregnant woman in all circumstances, and this is today’s topic. Stay tuned. Interpretation of the dream of walking on the sand of the beach by Ibn Sirinama. Interpretation of the dream of walking on the sand of the beach? When you see walking on the sand of a quiet beach in a dream, it means success, success and absolute happiness that the dreamer will obtain, while the raging sea is a bad sign for overcoming many adversities and obstacles. Which causes instability and distraction. Mind. If the sand on which a person walks is full of pebbles and stones, this indicates the accumulation of material problems and many difficulties and sorrows. A single person who sees himself walking in front of a clear sea is a good omen for a happy and intimate marriage, but walking next to a dirty sea symbolizes failure and failure to complete the ceremony. Wedding. Whoever sees himself walking on the sand of a beach during his sleep and was already sick, this is a sign of recovery from illness and enjoyment of a strong constitution and good health. Seeing himself walking on the sand of a beach in dreams carries many indications, as it could be an indication of the strength of the faith of the dreamer. And following the teachings of religion, and the dream can indicate the discovery of some things that the dreamer wanted. Make sure. If a person is relaxing on the sand of the sea, this indicates peace of mind and a life free of problems and crises that he is living in the current period. If a person dreams of walking on the sand of the beach and the sea water is turbid and impure, then this is evidence of many sins and committing immorality and transgressions. Seeing yourself standing on the beach without touching the water shows weakness of character and inability to face difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about walking on beach sand by Ibn Sirin According to what was stated in the dream interpretation books by Ibn Sirin: If a person sees in his dream that he is walking quickly on the beach, this symbolizes victory over The enemy, but if he is walking with the intention of reaching something, then he is. An indication of the good deeds and charitable projects that he carries out. When they imitate some animals that are eaten while walking in a dream on the sands of the sea, this is a desirable sign that the dreamer is a generous person who helps others, provides assistance to anyone in need, and spreads kindness and justice to people. But in the event that one sees that Walking backwards on a beach, the dream indicates corruption of religion and walking in an inappropriate path, or a bad sign of losing trade, or a bad omen that indicates going out of business. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of dreams of walking on the beach sand for unmarried women. An unmarried girl who sees the beach in her dream as calm and clean, symbolizes the coming of joys and a life of happiness and contentment. If she sees herself walking

title: Interpretation of a dream about pomegranates for a single woman and all of Ibn Sirin’s cases of good and evil

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of the dream of pomegranate for a single woman. Seeing a pomegranate in a dream is one of the happy visions that cause joy, kindness and happiness for the person who sees it. Pomegranate indicates kindness, money and a large, wide diet without fatigue, but the interpretation of the meaning of this vision in a dream differs according to the taste and color of the pomegranate and whether the fortune teller is a man, a woman or an unmarried girl. We will discuss all of this in detail during the following article of the encyclopedia. Interpretation of the dream of pomegranate for a single woman. Dream interpretation lawyers say that seeing a pomegranate in the dream of an unmarried girl means very good and a lot of sustenance, especially if she is at the beginning of her career. A large pomegranate in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes that a wealthy man will propose to her. If the pomegranate that appeared in the dream of an unmarried girl is edible, this vision indicates that she is religious with good morals, and that she will succeed in her work thanks to her diligence in it. Pomegranate in a dream for a girl who is still studying indicates the effort made to achieve excellence in her studies. A single girl's dream of a red pomegranate tells her that he is coming to make her happy and will change her situation for the better and she will be happy And reassured and satisfied in her life. Pomegranate seeds show more progress and stability, but if the girl is hungry and searches for pomegranates to satisfy her hunger, this indicates that this girl can control her emotions and words. If the pomegranate is rotten and spoiled, this indicates that she has made many wrong decisions in her life and that she needs to change the course of her life. This vision may indicate the appearance of a young man in her life and an attempt to deceive her. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream carrying a basket of pomegranates indicates her marriage to a wealthy man. Whoever sees in her dream that she is squeezing a pomegranate, her vision indicates that she is financially self-sufficient. One of the ominous dreams for an unmarried girl is her dream of a spoiled pomegranate, which indicates that she is accompanied by bad friends who will distance her from the path of truth. This vision may indicate that her emotions are retreating from the owner, which will make her stumble in her life. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is selling spoiled pomegranates, this vision symbolizes that she will cut off everything that connects her to people who have caused her harm. If the pomegranate is not damaged and the girl sees something wrong, A married woman in her dream that she is selling it, this means that she will fall into the forbidden. Interpretation of buying a pomegranate in a dream for a single woman The dream of a single girl buying a pomegranate indicates that she will achieve her goals. However, if the pomegranate that an unmarried woman bought in her dream is spoiled, this vision does not bode well for her. If she buys a fresh pomegranate, this is good news for her that her dream of marriage and childbirth will come true. This vision may indicate the dreamer’s repentance for the sins committed in reality. Whoever dreams of buying a white pomegranate, her vision indicates that God will grant her happiness in her life due to the purity of her heart and the absence of negative feelings. One of the ominous visions for an unmarried girl is her dream of buying a black pomegranate, as this vision indicates that there are many people in her life who have

title: Interpretation of glorifying God in a dream: Seeing the saying “Glory be to God” in a dream

preview.html: The dream of praising God is evidence of humility, and an indication of the good things to come, and other interpretations we translate for the single, for the married, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced, for the man, such as praising the hand, seeing the rosary, thanking God, saying “Allahu Akbar,” looking at the rosary in prayer, dedicating the green or blue rosary to Ibn Sirin, and more. On the subject: Interpretation of praise in a dream: When you see praise in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s humility, the extent of his religiosity, the strength of his faith, and his closeness to God Almighty. Praise is an expression of the servant’s gratitude to God Almighty. A blessing is coming. Whoever sees in his dream glorifying God Almighty, then he is a believer. And if he says, “Praise be to God,” while he is distressed, imprisoned, sick, or afraid, God will relieve him of what he does not expect. If he forgets to praise, he will be imprisoned or sad. And whoever prays an obligatory prayer in a dream, then the glory of God or God is greater, this is evidence of Fulfilling the debt, disavowing the obligation, fulfilling the oath, covenant, and loyalty. Condition. Praise be to God, Glory be to God the Great, and it is one of God’s blessings upon us, and it is one of the causes of relief. The rosary has the same interpretation. Dreaming of praise in a dream is one of the actions encouraged by the Islamic religion. Praise in a dream is evidence of the strength of faith and a person’s closeness to God Almighty and his interest in religious rituals, relief and relief from distress and distress. A dream of glorification may indicate good fortune and a good sign because of his A wonderful value in the sight of the Holy God. And whoever sees that he glorifies God Almighty, he will relieve his distress and remove his distress and hatred, for God Almighty said: (If it were not for those who glorify Him) the verse. In short, the vision of worship is interpreted in five aspects: getting close to God, and following the paths. Good deeds, the advice of kings, good news, salvation, and victory over enemies. And whoever sees that he is asking forgiveness from God, he will be granted wealth and a son, according to the words of the Almighty: (So I said, “Ask forgiveness of your Lord” verse. And whoever sees that he has finished his prayer, asks God Almighty for forgiveness, then he turns to God, so He accepts his supplication, and if he looks at someone other than the Crebla, then he commits a sin and then repents from it. And whoever sees that he is silent about asking for forgiveness indicates his hypocrisy, God Almighty says: “And when it is said to them: Come, the Messenger of God will ask forgiveness for you, if they turn their heads.” And if a woman sees that she was told to ask forgiveness for your sin, then she is accused of obscenity. And whoever sees: says Glory be to God for you, then his concern rejoices from where you do not expect. And whoever sees: as if he forgot to praise God, it will harm him and be imprisoned for a long time because of the past history of Joseph, peace be upon him. And whoever sees: that he glorifies God Almighty, he will illuminate his religion with light and guidance. And whoever sees that he pleases God Almighty, he will gain He will gain strength and increase in blessings, and if he is qualified for the command, he will have a good city to live in. God Almighty says: “And thank Him for a good city.” May the Lord forgive. It was said: The vision of praise and thanksgiving is an increase in grace and eminence, and he may have a son, because God Almighty said: (Glory be to God who gave me Ishmael). Interpretation of praise in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing praise in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s humility. Praising the rosary in a dream is evidence of Wealth and gaining honor and money in the near future. Seeing the rosary in a dream is evidence of money and a good life among people. Glorifying the touch

title: Kissing the hand in a dream

preview.html: In this article from gptafser.com/, you will read the complete interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the hand for a man and a woman, in addition to the meaning of a kiss on the mouth, hand, and foot, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing a hand kissed in a dream for a single girl. If a girl kisses a stranger’s hand in a dream, then this It is interpreted as someone who speaks falsely about her and insults her morals. When an unmarried woman dreams of a stranger kissing her left hand, this is a sign of her marriage, and God knows best. Kissing the hands of parents in a dream is evidence that the dreamer justifies them and treats them well. Kissing the hand of a lover in a dream, the problems that will arise Between them. See also: Interpretation of seeing a young girl kissing in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a hand kiss in a dream for a married woman. If a woman kisses her husband’s right hand in a dream. This explains her obedience to her and her appreciation for his presence in her life and in the lives of his children. And whoever sees her husband kissing her hand in a dream, this means his love for her. Kissing the left hand in a dream is not good and is interpreted as problems and fears. If a woman kisses her mother’s hand in a dream, she considers her a role model. Kissing a young son’s hand is evidence that the mother is showering him with her love and care. Interpretation of seeing a hand kiss in a dream about a man and its meaning. Scientists say The interpretation is that the kiss on the hand in a man’s dream. It symbolizes two things, the first of which is requesting a need from an authority and the second is gratitude and appreciation for someone. When a man kisses his wife’s hand in a dream, this is a sign of his love and gratitude for her. And whoever kisses his children’s hand in a dream needs their help. And God knows best. Kissing a stranger’s hand in a dream is interpreted by asking him about an important matter in the dreamer’s life. With the genie’s hand, he works magic and it works. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the cheek. The meaning of seeing a pregnant woman kissing the hand in a dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman kissing her husband’s right hand in a dream is a sign. On the birth of a boy who resembles his father. The left hand symbolizes problems, and God knows best. And whoever sees her husband kissing her hand in her dream will have a girl who looks like her. If she kisses the hand of an old man in a dream, she will enjoy an easy birth, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees him kissing the doctor’s hand, she will You feel reassured when you talk to him. Kissing the fetus’s hand explains the dreamer’s longing to see it and embrace it. Interpretation of the vision of kissing the hand in a dream for young men and its meaning. A kiss on the hand in a dream for young men expresses an interest that the dreamer seeks to acquire in order to improve his living conditions, and God knows best. A young man kissing the hand of the girl he loves in The dream is not worthy of praise. It is interpreted by the emergence of problems and disagreements between them that may end in breaking off the relationship, and God knows best. It is said that a young man kisses the hand of an unknown woman in a dream, but she looks beautiful and cares about her adornment. Evidence of his marriage to a wealthy woman whom he had been married to before. You may be interested in: A kiss On the neck in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a kiss on the cheek and neck in a dream. Seeing a kiss on the cheek in a dream means that the dreamer will receive money from those who kiss it. Also, a kiss on the cheek symbolizes forgiveness and pardon, and God knows best. When a man sees that he is kissing a girl on the cheek in a dream He is good
